headline: How The Tesco (LSE:TSCO) Story Is Shifting As Fair Value And Risk Assumptions Evolve
summary: What has actually changed in Tesco’s fair value story? The move in Tesco’s fair value estimate from £4.84 to £4.80 per share looks small on the surface, but it reflects a careful rebalancing of risk and growth in the valuation work. A slightly higher discount rate of 8.13% sits alongside a revenue growth assumption of 2.95%, which keeps the long run earnings narrative intact while acknowledging a more cautious backdrop. As you read on, keep an eye on how these subtle shifts feed into the...
